main event: A person and their son witnessed a bright green, oval-shaped metallic object that landed near them and then rapidly ascended and disappeared.
interesting points: The object gave off an intense glow and was approximately 20 feet in diameter and 10 feet in height while on the ground.
The witnesses observed the object closely for several minutes while it was on the ground.
As the object gained altitude, it decreased in size and then accelerated at a fantastic speed before disappearing from sight.
The witnesses were in a state of shock and unable to move while observing the phenomenon.
The witness has experienced other similar incidents in the past and tries not to falsely report what they are unsure of.
sighted object: an oval-shaped metallic object that glowed brightly
